comment.text: Pyrimidine metabolism; UMP biosynthesis via de novo pathway; UMP from orotate: step 1/2.
Pyrimidine metabolism; UMP biosynthesis via de novo pathway; UMP from orotate: step 2/2.

disease.name: Orotic aciduria 1
disease.description: A disorder of pyrimidine metabolism resulting in megaloblastic anemia and orotic acid crystalluria that is frequently associated with some degree of physical and mental retardation. A minority of cases have additional features, particularly congenital malformations and immune deficiencies.

comment.text: The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.
In the N-terminal section; belongs to the purine/pyrimidine phosphoribosyltransferase family.
In the C-terminal section; belongs to the OMP decarboxylase family.

property.value: P:'de novo' pyrimidine nucleobase biosynthetic process
